mapper.insert: insert into forum (fid, title, content, type, uid, status, time) values(#{fid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type},#{uid},#{status},#{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update forum set status = #{0} where fid = #{1}
mapper.select: select *from forum where uid =#{uid} and status = 1
select * from forum where type = #{0} and status = #{1}
